label: 怪物图鉴效果 Bestiary Effects

Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure).description: 吸血魔雾的AC和豁免检定获得+2状态加值。
Effect: Blood Siphon (Critical Failure).name: 效果: 鲜血虹吸(大失败) Blood Siphon (Critical Failure)

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: 效果: 呼神护卫 Divine Aegis

Effect: Waterlogged.name: 效果: 满溢 Waterlogged
Effect: Waterlogged.description: 当处于满溢状态，夸巴洛卡可以使用喷吐激流(Spray Water)动作，他们体型变为巨型(Gargantuan)并且速度下降到15尺。

Effect: Bloodline Magic.name: 效果: 血脉法术 Bloodline Magic
Effect: Bloodline Magic.description: 生物在欺骗检定上获得+1状态加值。

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword).name: 效果: 毁灭符文(巨剑) Rune of Destruction (Greatsword)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword).description: 巨剑获得致命（deadly）特征，重击时伤害增加3d12。并且被该武器命中的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] 检定，否则陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear).name: 效果: 毁灭符文(长矛) Rune of Destruction (Longspear)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear).description: 长矛获得致命（deadly）特征，重击时伤害增加3d8。并且被该武器命中的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] 检定，否则陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock).name: 效果: 毁灭符文(投石) Rune of Destruction (Rock)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock).description: 投石获得致命（deadly）特征，重击时伤害增加3d12。并且被该武器命中的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction|traits:arcane] 检定，否则陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword).name: 效果: 火焰符文(巨剑) Rune of Flames (Greatsword)
Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword).description: 巨剑的所有攻击造成额外[[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害}。

Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear).description: 长矛的所有攻击造成额外[[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害}。
Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear).name: 效果: 火焰符文(长矛) Rune of Flames (Longspear)

Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock).description: 投石的所有攻击造成额外[[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害}。.
Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock).name: 效果: 火焰符文(投石) Rune of Flames (Rock)

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword).name: 效果: 猛击符文(巨剑) Rune of Smiting (Greatsword)
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword).description: 巨剑命中时，巨人能击退目标10尺（重击则击退20尺）。

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear).description: 长矛命中时，巨人能击退目标10尺（重击则击退20尺）。
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear).name: 效果: 猛击符文(长矛) Rune of Smiting (Longspear)

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock).description: 投石命中时，巨人能击退目标10尺（重击则击退20尺）。
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock).name: 效果: 猛击符文(投石) Rune of Smiting (Rock)

Effect: Bittersweet Dreams.name: 效果: 苦乐交织的梦 Bittersweet Dreams
Effect: Bittersweet Dreams.description: 根据豁免成功等级不同，生物在攻击、豁免、技能检定上获得状态减值。

Effect: Countered by Water.name: 效果: 为水所克 Countered by Water
Effect: Countered by Water.description: 生物的攻击骰承受-1环境惩罚，他们的颚咬攻击不再造成火焰伤害。

Effect: Fed by Wood.name: 效果: 由木所生 Fed by Wood
Effect: Fed by Wood.description: 龙的颚咬附带的火焰伤害增加一个伤害骰。

Effect: Inspiring Presence.description: 生物在对抗恐惧效果时的豁免检定有+2 环境加值。
Effect: Inspiring Presence.name: 效果：鼓舞人心
